english.segment1: Jesus, King of my heart. Father, my peace and my light. Spirit, the joy of my soul You are
english.segment2: Jesus, to You none compare. Father, I rest in Your care. Spirit, the hope of my heart You are
english.segment3: The heavens declare you are God. And the mountains rejoice. The oceans cry "Alleluia". As we worship You Lord. For this is our song of love
english.segment4: Jesus, You saved my soul. I'll thank you forever more. Jesus, the love of my life You are
english.segment5: The heavens declare you are God. And the mountains rejoice. The oceans cry "Alleluia". As we worship You Lord. For this is our song of love
english.segment6: Jesus, I am in awe. Of the love that You have shown. Jesus, how precious You are to me
english.segment7: The heavens declare you are God. And the mountains rejoice. The oceans cry "Alleluia". As we worship You Lord
english.segment8: The heavens declare you are God. And the mountains rejoice. The oceans cry "Alleluia". As we worship You Lord. As we worship You Lord. For this is our song of love. Our song of love. Our song of love. This is our song of love. Our song of love. Our song of love. Our song of love. This is our song of love
